author: James Joyce
text: Dear Miss Bollach: A very tragic event in my family (the Italian branch of it) and the worry and trouble of the piracy and lawsuit (see papers sent herewith) are my excuse for the delay in answering you. I shall be happy if I am able to do anything for your friend and shall bear his case in mind though I donâ€™t understand if you mean literary or commercial work. With kind regards sincerely yours James Joyce
